page.title: 16Leisure in Wolsingham
page.content: Wolsingham has no leisure complex, the nearest being 10miles away.The {swimming pool}at the Comprehensive is open to the public in the evening,at weekends and in school holidays.On Wednesday evening,there is a local swimming club to provide coaching.A {tennis club}uses courts at the school. Two junior league{football teams play in the town,using the Recreation field and the Comprehensive School grounds. The{Venture House}is used by several groups,from Bridge,Indoor Bowls to Scouts,Cubs Guides and Brownies. The{Youth Club}meets on three weekday nights,with a 5_7pm session for little ones and the main session until 9.30pm.The facilities include a pool table,table tennis,badminton,a video and a disco.
